issue.title: Splitwise App
issue.body:
## Build expense-sharing app

**Features:**
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups, add expenses
- Split equally, view balances

**Tech:** Next.js 14, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js

**Pages:** Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Create project foundation with Next.js 14 setup, including package.json with all dependencies (NextAuth, Google OAuth provider, better-sqlite3, shadcn/ui, Tailwind), tsconfig.json with strict mode, .gitignore for Next.js, and initialize basic project structure (app/ directory, components/, lib/, prisma/ for SQLite schema).
ems.error: No workers merged - all had conflicts

ems.task: Implement authentication system and database layer. Create NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider, design and implement SQLite database schema for users, groups, expenses, and balances using Prisma ORM. Build all database models, migrations, and seed data. Owns: lib/auth.ts, lib/prisma.ts, prisma/schema.prisma, app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts.

workers.task: Setup Prisma ORM with SQLite. Create prisma/schema.prisma with User, Group, Expense, Balance models. Generate initial Prisma client. Create lib/prisma.ts with singleton Prisma client instance. Run initial migration to create database tables. All files owned exclusively by Worker-1.

Configure NextAuth.js with Google OAuth provider. Create app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts with NextAuth configuration. Setup Google provider with environment variables. Configure session strategy with JWT. Define session callback to attach user ID. Add Prisma adapter for session persistence. All files owned exclusively by Worker-2, imports from lib/prisma.ts but doesn't modify it.

Create Prisma seed file with sample data. Add seed script to package.json. Configure .env with Google OAuth client ID/secret placeholders and database URL. Create .env.example template. Run seed script to populate database with test users, groups, expenses, and balances. All files owned exclusively by Worker-3.

ems.task: Build core application logic and API routes. Implement group creation/management, expense creation with equal splitting logic, balance calculation algorithms, and all CRUD operations. Create RESTful API endpoints for groups and expenses. Owns: app/api/groups/, app/api/expenses/, lib/calculations.ts, lib/actions.ts for server actions.

workers.task: Create all API routes for group management (CRUD operations). Create GET/POST endpoints in app/api/groups/route.ts for listing and creating groups. Create GET/PATCH/DELETE endpoints in app/api/groups/[id]/route.ts for retrieving, updating, and deleting specific groups. Include validation and error handling.

Create all API routes for expense management (CRUD operations). Create GET/POST endpoints in app/api/expenses/route.ts for listing and creating expenses. Create GET/PATCH/DELETE endpoints in app/api/expenses/[id]/route.ts for retrieving, updating, and deleting specific expenses. Implement equal splitting logic when creating expenses.

Create balance calculation library in lib/calculations.ts with functions for calculating individual balances, total group expenses, and who owes whom. Create server actions in lib/actions.ts for group operations (createGroup, updateGroup, deleteGroup, addMemberToGroup) and expense operations (createExpense, updateExpense, deleteExpense). These will be consumed by the API routes created by Workers 1 and 2.

ems.task: Create all UI components and pages. Build landing page, login/logout flow, dashboard with group overview, group detail pages with expense lists and balance views. Integrate shadcn/ui components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, etc.) with Tailwind styling. Owns: app/page.tsx, app/login/page.tsx, app/dashboard/page.tsx, app/group/[id]/page.tsx, components/ui/, components/expense-form.tsx, components/balance-card.tsx.

workers.task: Create landing page and authentication pages with Google OAuth integration. Build shadcn/ui Button, Card, Input components with Tailwind styling. Implement app/page.tsx (landing), app/login/page.tsx (OAuth flow), and components/ui/button.tsx, components/ui/card.tsx, components/ui/input.tsx.

Build dashboard page with group overview, group detail pages with expense lists. Create Dialog and Label UI components. Implement app/dashboard/page.tsx, app/group/[id]/page.tsx, and components/ui/dialog.tsx, components/ui/label.tsx.

Create expense form component and balance card component with complete UI functionality. Build components/expense-form.tsx and components/balance-card.tsx with shadcn/ui integration and Tailwind styling.

analysisSummary: Build a complete expense-sharing application with Google OAuth authentication, group management, expense tracking, and balance calculations. Tech stack: Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, SQLite database, and NextAuth.js.
